reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Fifth contribution of the Italian Cooperation to the European Union Regional Trust Fund in response to the Syrian crisis - EUTF, the Madad Fund
Quinto Contributo della Cooperazione italiana al Fondo Fiduciario Regionale dell'Unione Europea in risposta alla crisi siriana

description.narrative: Il contributo italiano al Fondo Fiduciario Regionale "Madad" dell'Unione Europea -mira a fornire una risposta coordinata e coesa alla crisi siriana su scala regionale, rispondendo ai bisogni dei rifugiati siriani nei paesi limitrofi (Libano, Giordania, Iraq, Turchia, Egitto, Balcani occidentali e recentemente Armenia), nonche a quelli delle comunità ospitanti e delle loro amministrazioni, con un focus specifico sui processi di early recovery e resilienza.

The Italian contribution to the European Union "Madad" Regional Trust Fund aims at providing a coherent, coordinated and reinforced aid response to the Syrian crisis on a regional scale, responding to the needs of refugees from Syria in neighboring countries (Lebanon, Jordan, Iraq, Turkey, Egypt, Western Balkan and recently Armenia), as well as of the communities hosting the refugees and their administrations, with a specific focus on early recovery processes and resilience.
